name: Galeb Duhr
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.False Appearance: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.
traits.Rolling Charge: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Animate Boulders (1/Day): The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intelligence 1 and Charisma 1, it can't be charmed or frightened, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).
